meanings.sent1: My cat's meow woke me up this morning.
meanings.sent2: I love the cute meow of kittens.
meanings.sent3: The meow of the cat sounded like a tiny trumpet.
meanings.sent4: Her meow was like a gentle melody in the quiet room.
meanings.sent5: The meow echoed through the house, signaling the cat's hunger.

meanings.definition: To make the sound of a cat.
meanings.sent1: I meow to communicate with my feline friend.
meanings.sent2: When I meow, my cat responds with excitement.
meanings.sent3: He decided to meow loudly during the important meeting, causing everyone to laugh.
meanings.sent4: The wind seemed to meow softly through the trees on that peaceful night.
meanings.sent5: She meowed playfully, trying to mimic her pet's sounds.

meanings.sent1: The meow of the stray cat was heart-wrenching.
meanings.sent2: I can distinguish my cat's meow from other felines.
meanings.sent3: The meow of the cat interrupted the silence of the night.
meanings.sent4: Her meow was like a secret code only I could understand.
meanings.sent5: The loud meow echoed in the alley, drawing everyone's attention.
